name: market for purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate | purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21469/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate', in the geography of Chile. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;This activity represents the market for 1 kg of purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate. This product is only produced as a by-product, being rich in sodium nitrate, it is reused. This is a constrained market. The justification for a market constraint is included in the comment field of the conditional exchange. ;No transport in included as it is assumed that it is reused on site. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate',  within the geography of Chile.

This activity ends with the supply of  purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/089:Mining and quarrying n.e.c./0891:Mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals

exchanges.description: By-product of the potassium nitrate agricultural grade production. This product is futher used for the potassium nitrate production, industrial grade.
